pr_title: #6471 Add automatic document numbering and fix co-product componen type.

timeline.message: #6471 Add automatic document numbering and fix co-product component type.
#6473 Removed migration script & registering tab callout to already existing model validator.

timeline.bodyText:
what i meant to say in #6472 (review) is:

please ditch this class (PP_Product_BomModuleInterceptor)
register the new callout and the new tab-callout in the constructor of the existing model interceptor org.eevolution.model.validator.PP_Product_BOM
timeline.author: metas-ts
timeline.diffHunk:
